game.name: Adam and Eve Sleepwalker
game.description:
Oh my God, Adam has suddenly turned to be an active sleepwalker! The rescue missions of his beloved one, Eve, has already given him so many surprises. However, the bad thing happened to him is that he has got into a big trouble and found him at an unknown place that is far away from his sleeping bed. The man wants to do anything to get back to his home and continues sleeping. But, he cannot achieve his mission without your help. Are you interested in helping him out? Join Adam and Eve Sleepwalker and assist the man to get back to his bed!
In this brand new adventure game, you will enjoy the point-and-click puzzle game series for PC. It will be amazing to explore this tale where a prehistoric and fun-looking character has lost in the middle of the cold ice age and you will have to help him find the way to his home. Feel free to interact with characters and objects as well as clear all the dangers from his path in every stage! Adam is not going to move forward if intuitively senses danger. 
Figure out what items you need to click to make a way for him in this free online platform game! Come forward and solve out the puzzles to get him past each set of obstacles including bribing the seals, polar bears, and more! You will have plenty of logical puzzles to be sorted out, so there are no chances of getting you bored. Use your logical mind and help him to surprise his love by reaching fast at home in this one of the best puzzle games for boys! Remember this is a dangerous ice mountain, so do your way to lend our sleepy hero sleepwalk safely to his bed.
